img_text: 12:27 World War II bomb found and d... 0o0 Photo via @mostrecently World news World War II bomb found and detonated in Frankfurt Hundreds of houses were evacuated in the German city after the discovery of the wartime bomb. Upon detonation, it created a fountain over the river. Frankfurt am Main * @Stadt.FFM-1d ﹀ Please note: A WW2 bomb in the Main is to be defused tomorrow, Sunday, 14th! Around the area (see interactive map t1p.de/lIsz3) both river Banks will be locked until the operation is completed. For latest information follow @Polizei Ffm and @feuerwehrffm! Please share. What's happening? 2 仓
